system.description:
A flurry of clashing, rainbow-hued colours erupts from the caster’s hand.

  • Targets: [[/r 1d6]] creatures in the area of effect.

  • The effect: Depends on the HD of each target, relative to the caster:

    • HD less than or equal to caster: Knocked unconscious for [[/r 2d4]] rounds. (Creatures of 6HD or greater may save versus spells.)

    • HD up to 2 greater than caster: Save versus spells or be blinded for [[/r 1d4]] rounds. A blind creature cannot attack.

    • HD 3 or more greater than caster: Save versus spells or be unable to move, attack, or make other actions for one round.

  • Creatures that cannot see: Are unaffected by this spell.
